entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 10:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: SW 17 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind light except west 50 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
